api.email_change_mail_text: You have requested an email change. Please verify your new email address by clicking the link below. If you did not request this change you can ignore this email.
api.verify_email_sent: Verification link sent to your email. Link is valid for 30 minutes.
api.email_sending_failed: Email sending failed. This could be caused by invalid email address or server error.
api.invalid_display_name: Invalid display name. Display name must be 3-30 characters long.
api.invalid_given_name: Invalid first names. First names must be 2-70 characters long.
api.invalid_surname: Invalid last name. Last name must be 2-35 characters long..
api.invalid_domicle: Invalid domicle. Domicle must be 2-35 characters long.
api.invalid_preferred_full_name: Invalid preferred full name. Preferred full name must be 2-100 characters long.
api.profile_updated: Profile updated. Some changes require you to re-login to take effect.
api.ratelimit: Too many requests. Please try again later.

mail_list.loop: LOOP: Events, partner announcements, and academic matters related to Luuppi

auth.accept_terms: I accept the terms and conditions

hero.description: Luuppi ry is the student organization for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere. Since 1969, Luuppi has been actively advocating for its members' interests and organizing leisure activities. It boasts the largest membership among student organizations at the University of Tampere!

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: We are proud to work with these companies. If you are interested in collaboration don't hesitate to contact us!

telegram.title: Join our Telegram
telegram.description: In the academic world, Telegram is a widely used communication channel, and Luupi has its own groups! Join us to stay updated on events and other current affairs.
telegram.new_student_group: Are you a first-year student? First-year students also have their own group annually, which you should definitely join! The updated link to the first-year student group can be found on the first-year student page at the beginning of the academic year!

pages_board.seo_description: Luuppi ry's Board and Officials in

pages_404.title: Page not found
pages_404.description: Ooops.... The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again.
pages_404.seo_description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Page might have been removed or the URL is incorrect.

seo.title: Luuppi ry | Subject association for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere
seo.description: Luuppi ry is the subject association for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere. Luuppi has actively represented the interests of its members and organized recreational activities since 1969. With its membership, Luuppi is the largest subject association at the University of Tampere!

footer.description: Luuppi ry is the student organization for computer science, mathematics, and statistical data analysis at the University of Tampere.

pages_profile.username_explanation: Username is used to identify you on the website. It must be 3-30 characters long. Username can be displayed publicly.
pages_profile.given_name_explanation: All your official first names. This is information required by section 11 of the Associations Act, which will be verified upon joining the association.
pages_profile.surname_explanation: Official surname. This is information required by section 11 of the Associations Act, which will be verified upon joining the association.
pages_profile.preferred_full_name_explanation: Desired full name. This is the name by which you will be called within the association. This could be, for example, a nickname or another name you wish to be called by. This information is used, for example, in seating arrangements at events.
pages_profile.domicle_explanation: Your official domicle. This is information required by section 11 of the Associations Act, which will be verified upon joining the association.
pages_profile.major_explanation: Your major. Select other if your major is something else than computer science, mathematics, or statistical data analysis.

pages_error.title: Error
pages_error.description: An error occurred while processing your request.
pages_error.auth_description: There was an error during authentication. Please try again later.
pages_error.seo_description: An error occurred while processing your request.
